casebody.data:
George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections, et al., applicants,
v.
Herbert SMULLS. No. 13A790. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 29, 2014.

Application to vacate the stay of execution of sentence of death entered by the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit on January 28, 2014, presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the Court granted.
